headline: Potential Warsh Exit Puts UPS Board And Dividend Priorities In Focus
summary: UPS board member Kevin M. Warsh has been nominated to serve as Chairman of the U.S. Federal Reserve. Warsh has informed United Parcel Service that he will resign from the board if he is confirmed to the role. The potential departure would alter the board composition at UPS and link the company more directly to high level economic policy discussions. For investors watching United Parcel Service (NYSE:UPS), this boardroom news comes as the stock trades around $117.34 and reflects a mix of...

headline: United Parcel Service (UPS) Is Consistent, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About. United Parcel Service, Inc. (NYSE:UPS) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer talked about. Logistics giant United Parcel Service, Inc. (NYSE:UPS)’s shares are up by a modest 2.85% over the past year and by 15% year-to-date. Evercore ISI discussed the firm in late January. It […]

headline: How Recent Shifts Are Rewriting The Story For United Parcel Service (UPS)
summary: Why the UPS Fair Value Estimate Just Shifted The latest refresh of assumptions for United Parcel Service now points to a Fair Value Estimate of about US$113.18 per share, up from US$100.50, with the Discount Rate and revenue growth inputs also adjusted in the model. This change reflects research that balances upbeat views on tighter capacity, rate support, and ongoing shareholder returns with more cautious takes that flag execution risk, recent share price moves, and seasonality as potential...
